There is an PvP mode to fulfill all your PvP needs
You can help the server grow by voting every 12 hours! ::vote
You can view the list of commands using the command ::commands
You can improve the server by donating using the ::donate command
You can join the Valinor Discord by using the command ::discord
You should visit our website at: https://valinorpk.com
You can toggle features from the wrench in Advanced Options
You can enable or disable these messages with ::toggledyk
